languages.text: "Это усложнит мою работу над тем, чего вы от меня хотите. Если вы сделаете исключение для нескольких человек... впрочем, это обсуждаемо".
"This will hinder my progress on the work you wish me to complete. If you would make an exception for a few individuals... well, we can discuss it."
languages.original_text: "Это усложнит мою работу над тем, чего вы от меня хотите. Если вы сделаете исключение для нескольких человек... впрочем, это обсуждаемо".

traits.locale_text: "This will hinder my progress on the work you wish me to complete. If you would make an exception for a few individuals... well, we can discuss it."
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina

traits.locale_text: "This will hinder my progress on the work you wish me to complete. If you would make an exception for a few individuals... well, we can discuss it."
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina

traits.locale_text: "This will hinder my progress on the work you wish me to complete. If you would make an exception for a few individuals... well, we can discuss it."
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina

traits.locale_text: "This will hinder my progress on the work you wish me to complete. If you would make an exception for a few individuals... well, we can discuss it."
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina

languages.text: “如果是这样的话，恐怕会妨碍你要我完成的工作。如果你可以为少数人破例的话……嗯，这个问题我们可以再讨论。”
languages.original_text: "This will hinder my progress on the work you wish me to complete. If you would make an exception for a few individuals... well, we can discuss it."

traits.locale_text: “如果是这样的话，恐怕会妨碍你要我完成的工作。如果你可以为少数人破例的话……嗯，这个问题我们可以再讨论。”
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina

languages.text: «Esto entorpecerá mi progreso en el trabajo que quiere que complete. Si hiciera una excepción para algunos individuos... bueno, podríamos considerar la opción».
languages.original_text: "This will hinder my progress on the work you wish me to complete. If you would make an exception for a few individuals... well, we can discuss it."

traits.locale_text: «Esto entorpecerá mi progreso en el trabajo que quiere que complete. Si hiciera una excepción para algunos individuos... bueno, podríamos considerar la opción».
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina

languages.text: 「これは、あなたが私に完了させたいと望んでいる仕事の進捗を妨げます。もし何人かの人を例外にしていただければ…それについては話し合うことができます」
languages.original_text: "This will hinder my progress on the work you wish me to complete. If you would make an exception for a few individuals... well, we can discuss it."

traits.locale_text: 「これは、あなたが私に完了させたいと望んでいる仕事の進捗を妨げます。もし何人かの人を例外にしていただければ…それについては話し合うことができます」
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina

languages.text: « Cela entravera ma progression sur la tâche que vous m'avez confiée. Il est toutefois possible de négocier, si vous acceptez de faire une exception pour quelques individus. »
languages.original_text: "This will hinder my progress on the work you wish me to complete. If you would make an exception for a few individuals... well, we can discuss it."

traits.locale_text: « Cela entravera ma progression sur la tâche que vous m'avez confiée. Il est toutefois possible de négocier, si vous acceptez de faire une exception pour quelques individus. »
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina

languages.text: "Das wird meine Fortschritte bei der Arbeit bremsen, die ich vollenden soll. Wenn Ihr bei einigen Individuen eine Ausnahme machen könntet ... nun, darüber können wir noch reden."
languages.original_text: "This will hinder my progress on the work you wish me to complete. If you would make an exception for a few individuals... well, we can discuss it."

traits.locale_text: "Das wird meine Fortschritte bei der Arbeit bremsen, die ich vollenden soll. Wenn Ihr bei einigen Individuen eine Ausnahme machen könntet ... nun, darüber können wir noch reden."
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina

languages.text: "Bu durum, tamamlamamı istediğin çalışmanın ilerleyişini sekteye uğratacaktır. Birkaç kişilik bir istisna yapabilirsen o zaman bunu değerlendirebiliriz."
languages.original_text: "This will hinder my progress on the work you wish me to complete. If you would make an exception for a few individuals... well, we can discuss it."

traits.locale_text: "Tamamlamamı istediğin çalışmanın ilerleyişini sekteye uğratacaktır. Birkaç kişi için istisna yapabilirsen, o zaman üzerinde konuşabiliriz."
traits.speaker: QuarryWorld_Emelina
